title: shrI guruNA pAlitOsmi
sahitya:
shrI guruNA pAlitOsmi saccidAnanda nAthEna


anupallavi

  AgamAdi sannutEna akhila vishva vanditEna tyAgarAja vibhAtEna tApatrayArItena


caraNam    vedAntArtha vedyEna vikalpa roga vaidyEna nAdAnta supAdyEna nava nAthenAdyEna
sAdAkya kalAkarENa sadAshivAvatarENa nAdAnta vihArENa nava cakrAdhArENa
pAdAmbujEna varENa bhedAdi vidArENa Adi guruguhaparENa kAdi matam anusArENa
